I'm proud that I'm still tap dancing at 88". was a Canadian-born British actor, choreographer, tap dancer and television presenter. He appeared in The Limping Man (1953), The World of Suzie Wong (1960), The Cool Mikado (1963), The Beauty Jungle (1964), A Hard Day's Night (1964), Maroc 7 (1967) and Absolute Beginners (1986).
